parts.text:
"Extract the following Information from the provided document:
      -Money (OpEx, CapEx) used for environmental purposes (EU Taxonomy aligned CapEx and OpEx starting in 2024)

      Provide the page number, where the respective information was found. 
      Also provide the text section where you found the information.
      If the Information we are looking for is not disclosed in the document, set the is_disclosed field to 0.
      The required output format is JSON.
      Example:
      {            
            "is_disclosed": 1, 
            "indicator_id": "environmental_ex":,
            "value": "1.695",
            "unit": "SEK Millions",
            "page_number": "92",
            "section" : "Capital expenditure of environmentally sustainable activities (Taxonomy-aligned) 
(A.1) 832  Operational expenditure of environmentally sustainable activities (Taxonomy
aligned) (A.1) 863"
      }

"Extract the following Information from the provided document:
      -Total tevenue from products/services designed for low-carbon economy

      Provide the page number, where the respective information was found. 
      Also provide the text section where you found the information.
      If the Information we are looking for is not disclosed in the document, set the is_disclosed field to 0.
      The required output format is JSON.
      Example:
      {            
            "is_disclosed": 1, 
            "indicator_id": "lowCarbon_revenue":,
            "value": "85,990",
            "unit": "SEK Millions",
            "page_number": "92",
            "section" : "A. Turnover of Taxonomy-eligible activities (A.1 + A.2) 85,990"
      }

"Extract the following Information from the provided document:
      -Revenue for the reporting Period

      Provide the page number, where the respective information was found. 
      Also provide the text section where you found the information.
      If the Information we are looking for is not disclosed in the document, set the is_disclosed field to 0.
      The required output format is JSON.
      Example:
      {            
            "is_disclosed": 1, 
            "indicator_id": "revenue":,
            "value": "103,418",
            "unit": "SEK millions",
            "page_number": "92",
            "section" : "Revenue B.2 103,418"
      }

"Extract the following Information from the provided document:
      -Profit for the reporting Period. Specifically we are looking for net income after taxes, not income from continuing operations.

      Provide the page number, where the respective information was found. 
      Also provide the text section where you found the information.
      If the Information we are looking for is not disclosed in the document, set the is_disclosed field to 0.
      The required output format is JSON.
      Example:
      {            
            "is_disclosed": 1, 
            "indicator_id": "profit":,
            "value": "6,527",
            "unit": "SEK millions",
            "page_number": "92",
            "section" : "Result for the year 6,527"
      }

"Extract the following Information from the provided document:
      -Preferably the number of total full-time employees of the reporting company in the reporting year. Permanent and temporary employees are included in this metric.

      Provide the page number, where the respective information was found. 
      Also provide the text section where you found the information.
      If the Information we are looking for is not disclosed in the document, set the is_disclosed field to 0.
      The required output format is JSON.
      Example:
      {            
            "is_disclosed": 1, 
            "indicator_id": "employees":,
            "value": "15,263",
            "unit": "",
            "page_number": "92",
            "section" : "Total workforce 2024 2023 2022 Employee category Total workforce 15,263 15,126 15,326"
      }
